---
title: "Example trackdown doc"
---

```{r r-chunk-options, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr) 
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  root.dir = here::here(),
  fig.path = here::here("images//"),
  echo=FALSE,
  include = TRUE,
  dev='png',
  dpi=300,
  warning=FALSE
  )
```

```{r upload.download, eval=FALSE}

# I added these commands here for convenience. Don't run them as part of the rmd (hence eval=FALSE)
# They upload, update, and download the rmd file to the google drive.  
# there are other options render and add both the rmd and docx (or pdf file) at the same time.

trackdown::upload_file(file = here::here("trackdown-test.Rmd"),
                       gpath = "_00_TRACKDOWN/", hide_code = TRUE)
 
trackdown::download_file(file = here::here("trackdown-test.Rmd"),
                          gpath = "_00_TRACKDOWN/")

trackdown::update_file(file = here::here("trackdown-test.Rmd"), 
                        gpath = "_00_TRACKDOWN/", hide_code = TRUE)
```
